title: Mediabridge USB 2.0 - Micro-USB to USB Coiled Cable (1.5-3 Feet) - High-Speed A Male to Micro B with Gold-Plated Connectors
description: Mediabridge 2.0 Micro-USB to USB Coiled CableSync or charge the latest Smartphones, tablets, MP3 players, mobile phones, PDA's, digital cameras/camcorders & more, from your laptop, computer (Mac/PC) or other USB-enabled device. The coiled function stretches up to 3FT when necessary, & neatly retracts back to 1.5FT for portability. Corrosion-resistant gold-plated connectors & foil/braid shielding, gives this cable long-term use & defense against RF/EM interference, as well as bandwidth loss. A tough, yet flexible PVC jacket, well-defined fins, & durable connector mold ensures secure fits & easy installs. Full USB 2.0 capability; including 480 Mbps data transfer speed & backwards compatibility with older versions.Product Features- Sync/charge Smartphones, tablets, MP3 players, mobile phones, PDA's, digital or cameras/camcorders, from your laptop, computer & more- Coiled design can stretch from 1.5FT-3FT- Corrosion-resistant gold-plated connectors & foil/braided shielding- Full USB 2.0 capability, 480 Mbps data transfer speed & backwards compatibility- Tough, yet flexible PVC jacket, well-defined fins & durable connector mold- Transfer files, update software or charge devicesCompatibility- Mobile devices with a Micro-USB port, like Android, Samsung, Kindle, HTC, Motorola, Sprint, Nokia, LG, HP, Sony & Blackberry- Charges Samsung Galaxy Note 3 at full power- Doesn't work with the Samsung Galaxy Tab seriesInstallationPlug-&-play: Plug the standard Type-A Male connector into your computer, and the Micro Type-B connector into your other device to begin usingNotes- Verify your device has a Micro-USB port & not a standard USB, or Mini-USB port- Do not stretch over 3FTWarrantyLimited 1 Year WarrantySupportCall us Mon-Sat 9AM-6PM Eastern (extended hours Tue/Thu until 9PM). Emails answered within 1 business day
